channel.description: Recent content in protein phosphatase on funPlantGenes

item.title: BnaPP2C37
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnaPP2C37 Gene Name: Protein phosphatases type 2C 37 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnaPP2C37 Encodes a Nuclear and Cytoplasmic Phosphatase and Its Expression Is Induced by ABA and Drought Stress Treatments.

item.title: CaADIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA03g35550 Gene Symbol: CaADIP1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Description: The Pepper RING-Type E3 Ligase CaAIRF1 Regulates ABA and Drought Signaling via CaADIP1 Protein Phosphatase Degradation.

item.title: CaAIPP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaAIPP1 Gene Name: protein phosphatase 2C 37 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Functional analysis of the pepper protein phosphatase, CaAIPP1, and its interacting partner CaAIRF1: Modulation of ABA signalling and the drought stress response.

item.title: CaAIRE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA05g17640 Gene Symbol: CaAIRE1 Gene Name: ABA Induced RING-type E3 ligase 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Pepper E3 ligase CaAIRE1 promotes ABA sensitivity and drought tolerance by degradation of protein phosphatase CaAITP1.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc01g095080.3.1 Gene Symbol: LeACS2 Gene Name: 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylate synthase 2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Turnover of LeACS2, a wound-inducible 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylic acid synthase in tomato, is regulated by phosphorylation/dephosphorylation.
